amendment.description: To provide for a study by MedPAC on Medicare payments and efficiencies in the health care system.

vote.text: Amendment SA 941 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 941 proposed by Senator Grassley for Senator Wyden. (consideration: CR S8538; text: CR S8538) To provide for a study by MedPAC on Medicare payments and efficiencies in the health care system.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 941 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 941 proposed by Senator Grassley for Senator Wyden.
